flawed_nl_solution:
Gilbert planted 3 + 1 + 2 = <<3+1+2=6>>6 herb plants.
He gained a basil plant when one of the basil plants seeded a new plant, so he had 6 + 1 = <<6+1=12>>12 plants.
The rabbit ate both mint plants, so Gilbert had 12 - 2 = <<12-2=10>>10 herb plants when spring ended.
#### 10

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 7, not 12. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
